channel.title: Projects on Fairese
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Fairese

item.title: Silvianna 26
item.description: Silvianna 26 is a complete rebuild of Fairese’s beloved AniList client for iOS, redesigned with Apple’s Liquid Glass aesthetic, modern Swift Concurrency, and a renewed focus on effortless anime tracking.

item.title: Silvianna
item.description: Silvianna is an iOS client for anilist.co, a website for anime enthusiasts who enjoy tracking the anime they watch and the manga they read.
